alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 15 at 1:08PM MST until January 16 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM CST /7 PM MST/ THIS EVENING TO 10 AM CST /9 AM MST/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 16 below zero. * WHERE...In New Mexico, Northern Lea, Central Lea and Southern Lea Counties. In Texas, Gaines, Dawson, Borden, Andrews and Martin Counties. * WHEN...From 8 PM CST /7 PM MST/ this evening to 10 AM CST /9 AM MST/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken. If you must venture outdoors, make sure you wear a hat and gloves.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County
